Reviews.Title: “At home in Venice”
Reviews.Author: LadBroke8
Reviews.Content: traveled partner 2011 arrived evening easily lost tiny streets venice called hotel picked sent porter carried luggage led hotel pros 1 location especially gondola ride parked outside hotel doorstep 2 buffet breakfast typical italian cold cuts breads cheese set cozy sitting overlooking charming patio canals 3 staff friendly bathroom freshened daily cons 1 pro imho decor heavy dark hotels typical venetian decor furniture dark wood wallpaper dark green maroon heavy looked 2 bed cover looked tapestry skin itch

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay very much...”
Reviews.Author: micheleishome
Reviews.Content: booked hotel night prior cruise venice surprised price deal hotel former palace clean quiet hotel staff friendly accommodating especially andrea hotel free internet complimentary breakfast delicious bathroom overlooked canal hotel little hard worth tried book hotel cruise sold disappointed hotel western chain highly recommend casa nicolo priuli

Reviews.Title: “VERY disappointed.”
Reviews.Author: regina t
Reviews.Content: husband celebrating 25th booked superior double soley photos disappointedthe hotel shown photos palazzo priuli checked size shoe box write name glass dust suffocating reception moved accross hall roomit clean little told move day requested morning receptionist rude insulted explained photo misrepresentation hotel couldnt 45 sister hotelas tell ugly sister stage photo bare stayed didnt reception private apartments block noisy apart receptionist sunday afternoon helpful staff rude snooty location casa nicolo priuli paid 1000 euro 4 nights feel hotel poor value reccomend hotel strongly suggest booking check hotels staying experience consistent reviews compelled write review

Reviews.Title: “I have waited to try and be fair, but this is the worst experience ever ...”
Reviews.Author: andrewsydney
Reviews.Content: family 7 travelled hong kong europe january 2011 stayed fantastic reviews disaster firstly booked bookingcom left message hotel hi family traveling australia regards arrived address booking castello castello venice reception manned check told buildings course children split worse buildings building reception neither overnight reception price paying extraordinary booked photos premise checked step foot hotel checking 4 star stay 2 star mercure door booked hotel searched 3 star properties issues advertising detached premise searched booked secondly premises rated marketed letting customers bookingcom confirmation effect thirdly especially children elderly premise stay attended reception 24 hours searched hotel hotels feature listed amenities 24 hour hotel fourthly searched 3 star establishments standard arrived 6pm friday night 4 children 70 impossible relocate night venice frankly visiting night disappointing spend time reception shocked unprofessional surprises mistake commercial likes illegal home country attitude staff raised issues shrug shoulders tough luck sorry scratch casa nicolo priuli ok albeit steps steep corridors narrow elderly companion experience soured book faith suggest travellers stay elsewhere venice purposefully waited months posting review try objective result cant changed disgraceful unethical behaviour casa nicolo priuli caveat emptor

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: JulieLancashire50
Reviews.Content: hotel near major tourist sights ideal base exploring centre venice clean comfortable decorated typical venetian style breakfast continental choice served summer plenty restaurants nearby

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: EyesD
Reviews.Content: casa nicolo priuli bit confusing 4 star 3 star hotel street romantic looking canal opposite shops carnival masks seen stayed 3 star hotel adjacent buildings ours actually accessed street rear walk street corner breakfast actually fun lot antique style furniture looked nice heavy curtains wooden beams staff polite helpful people tv night hear bit

Reviews.Title: “Don't ask the front desk for help!”
Reviews.Author: AtlantaLovestotravel
Reviews.Content: concierge manager consistently incomplete outright misinformation offer free boat ride murano glass factory leave purchase expensive straight hotel told common practice hotels pay ferry island instead purchase map venice research rely hotel staff help otherwise hotel average quiet location

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value”
Reviews.Author: Dutch_Traveller_0412
Reviews.Content: deal hotel location perfect neighbourhood shops restaurants silent night 4 minutes marco square hotelroom beautifully decorated venice style free internet breakfast inside patio outside breakfast patio twice canal front hotel romantic stop marco san zaccaria 4 minutes walk quick access line 82 luggage left hotel convenient minor remarks hotel hard arrived late dark evening visit venice found reception closed phonecall told check palazzo nicolo priuli 20 meters street people complained outside lack thick curtains 305 darken windows woke morning time venice

Reviews.Title: “Great location and great price”
Reviews.Author: speedlucas
Reviews.Content: hotel nice expect hotel venice booked bookingcom found hotel deal emailing hotel refunded difference staff nice pleasant honest cant fault hotel wish spent time

Reviews.Title: “room for a princess!”
Reviews.Author: gipcyan
Reviews.Content: looking photos reviews internet wed heard tried email hotel times request particular slow reply finally minute managed book 301 gorgeous burgundy hung fabric wallpaper velvet curtains lovely wooden furniture views 2 windows onto canal below bathroom heated floors nice bath tub love venice promotion recieved bottle prosecco arival free newspaper tickets casino etc half price 2nd night stay breakfast lot selection lovely rich dark chocolate torte enjoyed stay

HotelInfo.Name: Casa Nicolo Priuli
HotelInfo.Address: Castello 4985/4, 30122 Venice, Italy
